title: Crime Alert 11.28.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.28.19
description:
Two women stealing guinea pigs use one as a weapon to hasten their getaway, and when her mother is getting beaten by her boyfriend a quick thinking daughter calls 911 to order a pizza.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
